mapper.select: select count(*) from police_training pt where pt.end_time >= date_sub(current_date(),interval 1 day) and pt.police_id in (select id from police where prison_id = #{prisonId})
select count(*) from police_training pt where pt.end_time >= date_sub(current_date(),interval 7 day) and pt.police_id in (select id from police where prison_id = #{prisonId})

select p.name policeName,t.name modelName,pt.end_time endTime from police_training pt,police p,training_model t where pt.police_id = p.id and pt.model_id = t.id and p.id in (select id from police where prison_id = #{prisonId}) limit 3

select t.name modelName ,count(pt.id) numberOfPolice from police_training pt,training_model t where pt.model_id = t.id and pt.end_time >= date_sub(current_date(),interval 7 day) and pt.police_id in (select id from police where prison_id = #{prisonId}) group by t.id

select pt.id as id,pt.model_id as modelId,t.name as modelName,pt.status as status,pt.result as result, pt.start_time as startTime,pt.end_time as endTime from police_training pt,training_model t where pt.police_id = #{id} and pt.model_id = t.id and ( t.id like concat('%',#{query},'%') or t.name like concat('%',#{query},'%') or t.description like concat('%',#{query},'%') or t.name like concat('%',#{query},'%') )

select pt.id as id,pt.police_id as policeId,p.name as policeName,t.id as modelId, t.name as modelName,pt.status as status,pt.result as result,pt.start_time as startTime , pt.end_time as endTime from police_training as pt,police as p,training_model as t,account as a where pt.police_id = p.id and pt.model_id = t.id and p.account_id = a.id and t.name like concat('%',#{modelName},'%') and p.prison_id = #{prisonId} and ( p.name like concat('%',#{police},'%')or a.account_number like concat('%',#{police},'%') )

select p.name as policeName, tm.name as modelName, pt.start_time as startTime, pt.end_time as endTime from police_training as pt, police as p, training_model as tm where pt.police_id = p.id and pt.model_id = tm.id order by pt.start_time desc
select count(id) from police_training where YEARWEEK(date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(),1)
select count(id) from police_training where TO_DAYS(start_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
